segment.source: Overview about Group Policy, Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM), and Internet Explorer 11
segment.target: Overview about Group Policy, Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM), and Internet Explorer 11

segment.source: Group Policy, Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM), and Internet Explorer 11 (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Group Policy, Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM), and Internet Explorer 11 (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Group Policy, Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM), and Internet Explorer 11
segment.target: Group Policy, Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM), and Internet Explorer 11

segment.source: Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) is an add-on license that available for the Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack (MDOP).
segment.target: Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) is an add-on license that available for the Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack (MDOP).

segment.source: This license gives you change control and a role assignment-model that helps optimize Group Policy management and reduce the risk of widespread failures.
segment.target: This license gives you change control and a role assignment-model that helps optimize Group Policy management and reduce the risk of widespread failures.

segment.source: From AGPM you can:
segment.target: From AGPM you can:

segment.source: Edit GPOs outside of your production environment.
segment.target: Edit GPOs outside of your production environment.

segment.source: Your GPOs are stored in an outside archive for editing, reviewing, and approving.
segment.target: Your GPOs are stored in an outside archive for editing, reviewing, and approving.

segment.source: Then, when you deploy, AGPM moves the GPOs to your production environment.
segment.target: Then, when you deploy, AGPM moves the GPOs to your production environment.

segment.source: Assign roles to your employees.
segment.target: Assign roles to your employees.

segment.source: You can assign 3 roles to your employees or groups, including:
segment.target: You can assign 3 roles to your employees or groups, including:

segment.source: Reviewer.
segment.target: Reviewer.

segment.source: Can view and compare GPOs in the archive.
segment.target: Can view and compare GPOs in the archive.

segment.source: This role can't edit or deploy GPOs.
segment.target: This role can't edit or deploy GPOs.

segment.source: Editor.
segment.target: Editor.

segment.source: Can view, compare, check-in and out, and edit GPOs in the archive.
segment.target: Can view, compare, check-in and out, and edit GPOs in the archive.

segment.source: This role can also request GPO deployment.
segment.target: This role can also request GPO deployment.

segment.source: Approver.
segment.target: Approver.

segment.source: Can approve GPO creation and deployment to the production environment.
segment.target: Can approve GPO creation and deployment to the production environment.

segment.source: Manage your GPO lifecycle with change control features.
segment.target: Manage your GPO lifecycle with change control features.

segment.source: You can use the available version-control, history, and auditing features to help you manage your GPOs while moving through your archive, to your editing process, and finally to your GPO deployment.
segment.target: You can use the available version-control, history, and auditing features to help you manage your GPOs while moving through your archive, to your editing process, and finally to your GPO deployment.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: For more information about AGPM, and to get the license, see Microsoft Advanced Group Policy Management 4.0 SP1 Step-by-Step Guide.
segment.target: For more information about AGPM, and to get the license, see Microsoft Advanced Group Policy Management 4.0 SP1 Step-by-Step Guide.
